animeDescription: Utopia is a song that was specially created for the True Tears x Hanasaku Iroha x Tari Tari Joint Festival Live featuring the seiyuu (voice actors) from the three series. P.A. Works produced a video of this song which is included in the the Blu-ray release of this event.
animeCharacters: ['Matsumae, Ohana', 'Yuasa, Hiromi', 'Isurugi, Noe', 'Sakai, Wakana', 'Tsurugi, Minko', 'Oshimizu, Nako', 'Okita, Sawa', 'Miyamoto, Konatsu', 'Andou, Aiko', 'Wakura, Yuina']
animeStaff: [['Hayami Saori', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tomatsu Haruka', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Toyosaki Aki', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Seto Asami', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
